availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elias Wilson McDaniel (Franklin County, Kentucky teamster and turnpike contractor)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, teamster and turnpike operator. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Evans McDaniel. Father of William H. McDaniel, Lena W. McDaniel, Florence R. McDaniel and Lillie McDaniel. Teamster in Franklin County in 1860. Turnpike contractor in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 278
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 125A
Indiana, Marriages, 1810-2001. Salt Lake City, Utah: FamilySearch, 2013. Floyd County, vol. 19, p. 215 (accessed 1/31/2019).
“Death of Eli McDaniel,” Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, Ky.), August 1, 1891, p. 2.
